message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper deals with the classification of crisis-related tweets using machine learning techniques. The paper specifically focuses on using graph-based deep learning frameworks and convolutional neural networks for semi-supervised learning. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category for this paper is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper also deals with data mining and information retrieval, which makes cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) another likely sub-category. The use of deep learning techniques also makes cs.LG (Machine Learning) a possible sub-category. The paper also deals with natural language processing and text classification, which makes cs.IR (Information Retrieval) another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with the use of machine learning techniques for crisis response, which makes cs.CY (Computers and Society) a possible sub-category.
